Description: Production-ready e-commerce platform infrastructure with HA, auto-scaling, and CDN - Multi-region capable

EnvironmentName.Description: Environment name that will be prefixed to resource names
EnvironmentName.ConstraintDescription: Must be development, staging or production

OwnerTag.Description: Owner tag for cost tracking and management

DomainName.Description: Domain name for the application (must be owned by you)
DomainName.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid domain name

CreateNewHostedZone.Description: Create new Route53 hosted zone (false if zone already exists)

ExistingHostedZoneId.Description: Existing Route53 hosted zone ID (required when CreateNewHostedZone is false, e.g., Z1234567890ABC)
ExistingHostedZoneId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid Route53 hosted zone ID or empty if creating new zone

CreateCertificates.Description: Create ACM certificates (set to false for testing with dummy domains)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers
InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type

DBName.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2 AMI ID from SSM Parameter Store

AlertEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications
AlertEmail.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid email address

EnableDetailedMonitoring.Description: Enable detailed CloudWatch monitoring for EC2 instances

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer
Security group for web servers in Auto Scaling group
Security group for RDS database instance

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow MySQL/Aurora access from web servers

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when average CPU is below 25%
Alarm when we have any unhealthy hosts
Alarm when target response time is too high
Alarm when RDS free storage is below 10GB

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet group for RDS database in private subnets

StaticContentBucketName.Description: S3 Bucket name for static content

StaticContentBucketArn.Description: S3 Bucket ARN for static content

ALBAccessLogsBucketName.Description: S3 Bucket for ALB access logs

SNSTopicArn.Description: SNS Topic ARN for infrastructure alerts

ApacheAccessLogGroupName.Description: CloudWatch Log Group for Apache access logs

ApacheErrorLogGroupName.Description: CloudWatch Log Group for Apache error logs

WAFWebACLArn.Description: WAF WebACL ARN for CloudFront protection (only created in us-east-1)

Region.Description: AWS Region where stack is deployed
